contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 1987, the order of Superior Court is vacated and the case remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Centre County for proceedings consistent with Commonwealth v. Andrew Revtai, Dennis Allen Briggs, Alan Keith Seeger, Cathryn Lee Press, Monroe C. Hatcher, Sr. and Michael T. McConville, 516 Pa. 53, 532 A.2d 1 (1987).
